title: The Druid's Harp of Ireland: Part 2
description:
Today is part two of our special St. Patrick's Day story all about an epic Irish battle and the amazing power of music!


If you would like to support Stories Podcast, you can subscribe and give us a five star review on iTunes, head to patreon.com/stories and pledge to make a monthly donation, or just tell your friends about us! You can also check out this episode's sponsor, Mathnasium! Visit mathnasium.com/STORIES to learn more about their programs, or call 885-910-MATH!


Now you can find new episodes of Stories, completely ad-free, on Stitcher Premium! For a free month of Stitcher Premium, go to stitcherpremium.com/wondery and use promo code 'WONDERY'.


Thank you!!
